Errors.Unsupported: RWC-IOT-001: Proximity hardware (NFC/BLE) is not available on this device.
Errors.EmergencyMode: RWC-IOT-002: Proximity scan aborted due to energy emergency protocol.
Errors.ReadError: RWC-IOT-003: Critical error during physical sensor reading.
Errors.PermissionDenied: RWC-IOT-004: User denied access permissions to the proximity sensor.

Status.TagDetected: Hardware signal detected and successfully refined.
